text: Volleyball at the 2019 European Youth Summer Olympic Festival was held in two venues in Azerbaijan. Volleyball matches were held at the Darnagul Arena and the MES Sport and Health Center, Baku from 22 to 27 July 2019. ==Competition schedule== All times are local Azerbaijan Time (UTC+4). {|
